thread.title: Devonta Freeman Contract: Latest News, Rumors on Negotiations with Falcons
thread.title_full: Devonta Freeman Contract: Latest News, Rumors on Negotiations with Falcons

author: Joseph Zucker
title: Devonta Freeman Contract: Latest News, Rumors on Negotiations with Falcons
text: Devonta Freeman Contract: Latest News, Rumors on Negotiations with Falcons Dustin Bradford/Getty Images Joseph Zucker Featured Columnist January 30, 2017 Although Devonta Freeman has one more year remaining on his current deal with the Atlanta Falcons , the two-time Pro Bowl running back may begin examining his long-term future with the team this offseason. Freeman's agent, Kristin Campbell, laid out what she expects the Falcons to do in order to keep her client in Atlanta. "It's time for the Falcons to pay him like the elite back he is," Campbell said, per NFL Network's Michael Silver . "I expect them to make him a priority this offseason, as he's been an integral part of the dynamic offense that has gotten them to the Super Bowl." More to follow.
